install.name: Image Showcase
install.author: Kaysten Mazerino
install.description: A module that displays a slideshow of images from a path (directory).

param.name: include_js
param.label: Include Javascript
param.description: Set this to 'No' if your template will already be including the mootools javascript.

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module, this allows individual module styling

param.name: images_path
param.label: Images Path
param.description: A relative path to the location of images to show.

param.name: transition_time
param.label: Trasition Time
param.description: The time it takes to fade from one image to the next in milliseconds.

param.name: delay_time
param.label: Delay Time
param.description: The time delay between picture fades in milliseconds.

param.name: web_links_catid
param.label: Web Links Category ID
param.description: If this value is populated, the links in the Web Links Category specified will be used in anchor tags for the images displayed in the module.

param.name: default_link
param.label: Default Link
param.description: If this value is populated, this link will be used for any image that does not have an associated Web Link.

param.name: container_width
param.label: Container Width
param.description: The height for the container div.

param.name: container_height
param.label: Container Height
param.description: The height for the container div.

param.name: start_image
param.label: Start Image
param.description: This determines which image to show the user first. First will always show the first image, random will randomly pick an image, and last seen will store a cookie on the user's browser and always start at the last one they were shown.

param.name: image_order
param.label: Image Order
param.description: This determines the order in which to show images. Forward will show them forward in the order they are found on the server, Backward shows them in the reverse of that order, and Random will randomly pick the next image to show.

param.name: ping_pong
param.label: Ping Pong
param.description: If this is checked, the show will start with the image order selected above and reverse when it hits the end of the image list.

param.name: image_scale_mode
param.label: Image Scale Mode
param.description: This determines how the image height and width are set.

param.name: image_vertical_align
param.label: Image Vertical Align
param.description: This determines how the image is aligned vertically.

param.name: image_horizontal_align
param.label: Image Horizontal Align
param.description: This determines how the image is aligned horizontally.

param.name: delay_image_loading
param.label: Delay Image Loading
param.description: Set this to 'Yes' if you want to wait until domready to set your image sources.

param.name: play_count
param.label: Play Count
param.description: This is the number of times to play through the image list. If this is set to 0, it will repeat forever.

param.name: mod_imageshowcase
param.label: Version Information
param.description: Up to date version, support, and review information from CMS Market.
